section.name: HL7 over HTTP
section.p: This is the homepage for the HL7 over HTTP initiative. Welcome!
HL7 over HTTP is a new transport mechanism aimed at replacing the traditional HL7 v2 Mininal Lower Layer Protocol (MLLP) transport with a modern, standards-based approach.
This site has two useful sections:

ul.li: The Specification itself. We are soliciting opinions and comments on this specification, so please get in touch.
A Java based API for implementing HL7 over HTTP in your application. The Java based API can be embedded in applications that use HAPI, and in applications that don't.
